thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Strategic Location
thread.title_full: Strategic Location - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: 890leey
title: Strategic Location
text:
Very comfortable stay with a strategic location. Above a shopping mall and within walking distance to the shopping district. In addition, the train station is at the door step. Possible to walk to Tiananmen and the Forbidden City. "Made in China" restaurant serves one of the most highly recommended Peking duck in town.
Will go back to Grand Hyatt in my next visit.
